comment.author: 54126708@N03
comment._content: The South Australian Advertiser (Adelaide, SA : 1858-1889) (about)  < Page  1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8of 8 <  shows Caldwell & Howes in Sussex Street destroyed by fire in 1883.  thas was just Howes, late Caldwell & Howes" in 1889

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54126708@N03] Thanks for the info. I found a Sydney Morning Herald article on Trove about the fire in 1883. Please add your link if you still have it.
